Text:
A balance between my expectations and
the sanity of the soldiers...

(Hmm... Even if they technically understand, it's
pointless if they can't implement it.)

(The more concrete the measures, the less they take
shape. They'll still be as lost as before...)

(That said, my military experience and spartan
upbringing are of little help. I need to come up
with a new way of thinking.)
We're still not done yet! Keep moving!
I... I can't...
M-Me neither...

(I shouldn't have recklessly increased the practice
load. I regret that.)

(It wasn't a bad idea to add variety to their
training. I'll revise the pattern and implement
these changes while finding more fundamental
methods for improvement...)
...I guess I should get an outside opinion.
Lady Epsilon, may I have a moment of your time?
Huh? Lambda? It's rare for you to casually drop by.

...You look kind of tired. Did something happen?
Anyway, come in.
Thank you.

I recently acquired a new blended tea.
Here you go, enjoy.
Thank you. This tea...has a calming scent.

Hehe. It's a calming herb. You came at the
perfect time.
So...what happened?
Well...
Lambda tells Epsilon everything that happened.

I see... You're up against a difficult assignment.
And you say you're having trouble coming up
with a solution?

Yes, exactly. Knowing how reliable you are, Lady
Epsilon, I was hoping you could offer some advice...
Reliable? My, how flattering!

Well, I'm sorry to disappoint...but no solution
comes to mind.
I see…

Still, it's great that you're trying to rely on
others instead of keeping it to yourself!

B-But...this was a task specifically assigned to me,
and—

Hold on! It's not like Alpha said you need to come up
with a solution on your own, did she? You're
overthinking this.
Tr-True...

All of us in the Seven Shadows have relied on you,
Lambda. Even in the Seven Shadows, most of our
problems are solved with the help of the others
rather than alone.
Anyway! You shoulder too much on your own, Lambda!

If you have a problem, why not talk to someone and
solve it together? That's what we do in the Seven
Shadows. Isn't that what friends are for?
Lady Epsilon...

...I see. No matter how skilled you are, there are
some problems you can't solve alone.

That's when you turn to your comrades to help solve
your problem. It seems I'd forgotten...this valuable
truth.

Exactly! Oh, but we're getting off-topic... What were
we talking about again?

Don't worry. You've already given me plenty of
advice.
R-Really? As long as you think so.
I do. I think I've come up with a solution!

Glad to see you're feeling better! Oh, I've got some
new sweets. Would you like to eat them with me?

With a radiant expression on her face, Lambda
chats happily with Epsilon.
